title: Businesskorea
text: [ KAIST's quadruped robot "Raibo2" is set to make history by attempting to complete a full marathon course for the first time in the world. The challenge will take place at the 2024 Sangju Gotgam Marathon on Nov. 17, with the event being held at Sangju Citizen Stadium.
